response.job_title: Geotechnical Engineer / Hydraulic Engineer / Structural Engineer / Earthworks Engineer
response.summary: Engineer civil, with experience in research and national and international regulations related to civil engineering in the following sectors: Solar and Wind Power Generation, Mining, Oil and Gas and Road Infrastructure. With knowledge in the use of tools such as: AutoCAD, Civil 3D, Architectural and Structural Revit, Microsoft Project, SolidWorks, Excel and Office package, Matlab, Python, JavaScript, EPANET, EPA SWMM, Watercad, QGIS, ArcGIS, ENVI, Global Mapper, ERDAS, Hidroesta, Slide, Settle, GEO5, PLAXIS 3D, SAP2000, STAAD PRO, SPSS among others, as well as having a strong sense of leadership, teamwork, and proactivity.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Liderazgo, Microsoft Excel, JavaScript, SAP2000, Python, Watercad, QGIS, ArcGIS, Slide, EPANET, EPA SWMM , Microsoft Project    , SolidWorks, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Revit, AutoCAD

profile_positions.description:
ODS 017 - Specialized Technical Support
STO - 641: Management of rainwater in the area adjacent to Norgas Sebastopol Station.
STO - 569: Soil study and slope stability analysis.
STO - 574: Evaluation and efficiency of the rainwater and oily water separation system.
STO - 658: Engineering of the oily water network for the low tank sector at Sebastopol Station.
STO - 648: Improvement and updating of the drinking water system at Toledo Plant.
STO - 664: Diagnosis of the operational status of the wastewater treatment plant at Mariquita Station.
STO - 531: Improvements in the crude oil collection system of the API separator and oxidation pond.
STP - 803: Calculation report for platform design for tanks TK-702 and 703 at Pozos Colorados.
STO - 668: Calculation report for platform design for valve and box access.
STO - 696: Change in the design bases of equipment/process for Galán Plant.
GDA-ES-032: Technical specification for design and construction with Geosynthetics.
ODS O78 - Verification of Aerator Anchoring Support.
ODS O78 - Detailed engineering for technological update - Geotechnical study.
ODS 064 - Phase 2 sanction: Intervention program for lines (8 initiative package) - Environmental, Structural, and Geotechnical Studies for the following Initiatives:
ODS 073 - Seismic vulnerability study and pathology of TMC pier.
ODS 087 - Engineering for the design of a 3.2km long and 120m deep PHD in MARÍA LA BAJA.

Foxconn Project Building A1 Phase 2 - Model, Design, and Calculation Report of Hydrosanitary Networks in REVIT MEP for the industrial plant of Foxconn in Mexico.

EMRyC in Dos Bocas: Detailed Engineering for the Design, Quantity Survey, and Drawing Preparation of the connecting road between the industrial plant of TRANSCANADA in Mexico.

The INNA Project - Preparation of Geotechnical Calculation Report, earth movement, and geometric design of roads for the Hydrogen and Green Ammonia Production Plant located in the commune of Taltal, Chile.

Among many others.
profile_positions.title: Civil engineer

profile_positions.description:
I work as a civil engineer specializing in hydraulic engineering, hydrology, geometric design of roads, and geotechnics. My role involves detailed design generation for the following solar parks:
• Girasoles
• Brisas 1
• Buga
profile_positions.title: Civil Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I work as a Coordinator and/or Support in different areas, primarily in GIS (Geographic Information System) for the components of Geology, Geotechnics, Hydrology, Geomorphology, Hydraulics, Oceanography, and Environment. My role involves obtaining Geo-Databases (GDBs) according to the data directories of contracting entities such as ANLA, INVIAS, and IDU. I also handle the acquisition of DEMs (Digital Elevation Models), Geostatistical Models, and processing for obtaining isohyets, isotherms, precipitation models, pH models, salinity models, hydraulic conductivity models, as well as database management.

In addition, I participate in the following activities or contracts:
• 2752 of 2019 INVIAS.
• Hydrological and Hydraulic Analysis for the Piura River.
• Geostatistics applied to oil exploration for the National Hydrocarbons Agency.
• Design and stabilization of containment structures.
• Corridor and road layout for projects in phase 0 and phase 1.
• Forest inventories.
• Remote sensing for fragmentation analysis, cover identification, and analysis of NDVI, NDWI, NDS, and NBR, among others.
• Preparation of traffic and transportation studies.
• Design and development of automation tools for multicriteria analysis, among others, using ModelBuilder and Graphic Modeler.
• Disaster risk management for environmentally impactful projects.
profile_positions.title: Coordinador de proyectos

profile_positions.description:
I work as an assistant in coordination tasks, as well as a draftsman and GIS support for the components of Geology, Hydrology, Geomorphology, Geotechnics, Hydraulics, Oceanography, and Environmental. My role involves obtaining the GDBs according to the data directories of the contracting entities ANLA, INVIAS, and IDU, as well as obtaining DEMs, detailed drawings, and monthly report preparation, managing schedules and final reports, and providing support in the preparation of the EIA for the following contracts:
• 2752 of 2019 INVIAS.
• 1113 of 2016 IDU.
• 1398 of 2017 IDU.
• 1291 of 2017 IDU.
• 1821 of 2020 INVIAS.
Note: EIA stands for Environmental Impact Assessment.
profile_positions.title: Support civil engineer.

profile_positions.description: Activities corresponding to the Resident Civil Engineer for the implementation of new traffic signal intersections and pedestrian enhancements assigned, as well as traffic management plans.
profile_positions.title: Resident Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy project: for the National Roads Institute - INVIAS 2019-2020 - Contract 3252
Consultancy for the evaluation of national and international regulations for the construction of infrastructure in different modes of transportation: railway, road, and maritime. Taking into account all stages of a project's life cycle, from planning and design to construction and operation.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineering Assistant

education.degree_name: Master's Degree in Systems Engineering and Computer Science

company.name: Worley
company.description:
Worley is a leading global provider of professional services in the energy, chemicals and resources sectors. We partner with our customers to address their most critical challenges at every stage of their projects: from initial concepts to sustaining and enhancing their assets. And we provide smarter, bolder solutions while delivering on our own sustainability commitments.

We are 51,000 bright minds across 46 countries all driven by a common purpose – delivering a more sustainable world. While working to fulfill our ambition to be recognized globally as a leader in sustainability solutions.
